dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - MS Ref
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, June 03, 2005 12:30 PM
To: Internet2@microsoft-antipiracy.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity - MS Ref. 37548]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity - MS Ref. 37548
Date: Fri, 3 Jun 2005 10:24:42 +0100
From: MSAntiPiracy02 <Internet2@microsoft-antipiracy.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>,        <copyright@theplanet.com>

VIA EMAIL:

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity

URL:
http://www.al-garya.com/hewar/showthread.php?s=88ef69c158bf877b31b1456027ae7
040&t=22156,
http://www.al-garya.net/hewar/showpost.php?p=217059&postcount=1,
http://www.al-garya.net/hewar/showthread.php?p=217059&mode=threaded
CASE #: 37548

03 June 2005

Dear Sir or Madam,

Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which
appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed copies
of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted
computer programs published by Microsoft.

1. Identification of copyrighted works:

Computer program(s):
Windows Longhorn 3683

Copyright owner:
Microsoft Corporation

2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following
location(s):
http://www.al-garya.com/hewar/showthread.php?s=88ef69c158bf877b31b1456027ae7
040&t=22156,
http://www.al-garya.net/hewar/showpost.php?p=217059&postcount=1,
http://www.al-garya.net/hewar/showthread.php?p=217059&mode=threaded

The above location is offering 'Cracks' or 'Product Keys', intended to
circumvent technical measures that control access to Microsoft's copyrighted
works and that protect Microsoft's copyrights in those works.

3. Statement of authority:

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this
notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Microsoft,
the owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good
faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been
authorized by Microsoft, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take
expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described
above, and thereby prevent the unauthorized distribution of these cracks and
product keys via your company's network.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding
what actions you take.

Yours sincerely,

James Young
Internet Investigator

on behalf of Microsoft Corporation
One Microsoft Way
Redmond, WA 98052
United States of America

E-mail: Internet1@microsoft-antipiracy.com


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCoJOzvK/XpJs6oyURAv5wAKCD8zGuw3UWunr3wp8ZJxchpO+UQQCdFe86
L6Mzs7l2VNbMOAhjkIgOL/o=
=aLkQ
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
